news.title: Disney names parks boss Josh D’Amaro as its next CEO to succeed Bob Iger, effective March 18
news.summary: Josh D'Amaro, chairman of Disney Experiences, named as next CEO. He will succeed Bob Iger, ending a closely watched succession race.

news.title: Ray Dalio warns the world is ‘on the brink’ of a capital war
news.summary: Billionaire Bridgewater founder also weighed in on investing in gold. The metal was gripped by a sharp sell-off after the financial crisis.

news.title: Palantir surges 11% after beating earnings estimates
news.summary: The rise comes on the back of months of decline for the stock. The stock has been on the decline since the beginning of the year.

news.title: Property Play: December CRE deal volume sinks further, but office is a surprising bright spot
news.summary: The recovery in office has been swelling, as return-to-office orders and a boom in AI employment counter the pandemic-driven narrative that office is over.

news.title: House hardliners complicate ending government shutdown as Speaker Johnson moves ahead
news.summary: The U.S. government partially shut down Saturday morning after Congress failed to pass legislation to keep it funded. The government was partially funded by a measure passed by Congress in October.

news.title: ‘I’m rich in everything but parents’: I inherited $400K. Is it unwise to use this money to buy a house with my fiancé?
news.summary: “I’m a 40-year-old woman in a committed relationship, and I’ve experienced the loss of both of my parents,” she said.

news.title: PepsiCo cut prices on Doritos, Cheetos after customer complaints about affordability
news.summary: PepsiCo's stock was set to pull back, despite an earnings beat and a raised dividend. PepsiCo’s stock was pulled back, even though an earnings beating and a raise dividend.

news.title: How a single tech heavyweight managed to pull the rug on gold and global markets
news.summary: Panmure Liberum’s Joachim Klement says Microsoft jolt triggered a contagion effect across trendy assets. Klement: ‘Last week’’ was a ‘catalyst’ for other tech companies.

news.title: Pfizer study finds patients lose up to 12% of their weight after taking once-a-month drug
news.summary: Pfizer is forecasting a profit decline due to the impact of the Trump administration’s policies on pricing and tariffs. Pfizer on Tuesday hailed a study of a weight-loss-drug candidate.

news.title: PayPal’s stock slides as disappointing earnings usher in a CEO change
news.summary: PayPal saw a major slowdown on a metric closely watched by investors. Soon, HP veteran Enrique Lores will be tasked with turning the company around.
